attributes.action: Stop proposals making passing Maths & English a must for university education
attributes.additional_details: Part of the governments ‘shake-up’ will mean that students who fail their Maths or English GCSE will be ineligible for student loans. Refusing such students from higher education would exclude an enormous proportion of students but especially impact those already disadvantaged in education.
attributes.background: This petition calls upon the government to scrap this proposal. Higher applications to University should not be solved by excluding those already disadvantaged and further reproduce the status quo in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609369
